ðŸš€ Debian/Ubuntu Setup

Step 1: Add GPG Key

curl -fsSL ${REPOSITORY_URL}/keys/gpg-key.asc | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/authentik-keyring.gpg

Step 2: Add Repository

echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/authentik-keyring.gpg] ${REPOSITORY_URL}/ ${DISTRIBUTION} ${COMPONENTS}" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/authentik.list

Step 3: Update and Install

sudo apt update
sudo apt install authentik-cli
